name: Bug Gulp
description:
Roly-poly your way through 3 stages to reach the 7-11 and its coveted Bug Gulp! This is a prototype made for the 2021 PIGSquad Summer Slow Jam. 

Xbox Controller:

  • LB - Roll
  • Y - Jump
  • Left Stick - Move/Steer

Keyboard & Mouse

  • Left Click/Control - Roll
  • Space - Jump
  • Arrows/WASD - Move/Steer

Credits:

  • Lia Snyderman, Max Piepenbrink, Wesley Mueller
